Property.name: EnableDCIntro
Property.HelpText: Replaces the opening sequence with the Dreamcast version's. A work-in-progress for now.

Property.name: Force169
Property.HelpText: Removes the black bars that simulate a 4:3 aspect ratio in certain scenes.

Property.name: SA2BAnims
Property.HelpText: Reverts Sonic's movements and the camera angles used in the first shot of the Hero Story intro to the SA2B versions.

Property.name: TrialAudio
Property.HelpText: Enable this to utilize the shortened version of the Hero Intro theme heard in SA2: The Trial.

Property.name: TrialSonic
Property.HelpText: Sonic wears his classic shoes in all scenes. Can be combined with "Enable Amy's Eyeliner".

Property.name: AmyEyeliner
Property.HelpText: Amy applies makeup for all of her scenes. Can be combined with "Enable Trial Sonic in Cutscenes".
